name: The Weather Painter Sun
text: If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 face-up Continuous Spell/Trap you control to the GY; Special Summon this card in Defense Position, and if you do, place 1 "Weathery" Spell/Trap from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up. You can only use this effect of "Sunny Weathery Bengala" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card on the field was banished to activate a "Weathery" card's effect: You can Special Summon this banished card.
